description: Gets the component of an application registered with AWS Systems Manager for SAP.

nested_items.name: Component
nested_items.description: The component of an application registered with AWS Systems Manager for SAP.

nested_items.name: ComponentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the component.

nested_items.name: Sid
nested_items.description: The SAP System Identifier of the application component.

nested_items.name: SystemNumber
nested_items.description: The SAP system number of the application component.

nested_items.name: ParentComponent
nested_items.description: The parent component of a highly available environment. For example, in a highly available SAP on AWS workload, the parent component consists of the entire setup, including the child components.

nested_items.name: ChildComponents
nested_items.description: The child components of a highly available environment. For example, in a highly available SAP on AWS workload, the child component consists of the primary and secondar instances.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application.

nested_items.name: ComponentType
nested_items.description: The type of the component.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the component.
ACTIVATED - this status has been deprecated.
STARTING - the component is in the process of being started.
STOPPED - the component is not running.
STOPPING - the component is in the process of being stopped.
RUNNING - the component is running.
RUNNING_WITH_ERROR - one or more child component(s) of the parent component is not running. Call GetComponent to review the status of each child component.
UNDEFINED - AWS Systems Manager for SAP cannot provide the component status based on the discovered information. Verify your SAP application.

nested_items.name: SapHostname
nested_items.description: The hostname of the component.

nested_items.name: SapFeature
nested_items.description: The SAP feature of the component.

nested_items.name: SapKernelVersion
nested_items.description: The kernel version of the component.

nested_items.name: HdbVersion
nested_items.description: The SAP HANA version of the component.

nested_items.name: Resilience
nested_items.description: Details of the SAP HANA system replication for the component.

nested_items.name: HsrTier
nested_items.description: The tier of the component.

nested_items.name: HsrReplicationMode
nested_items.description: The replication mode of the component.

nested_items.name: HsrOperationMode
nested_items.description: The operation mode of the component.

nested_items.name: ClusterStatus
nested_items.description: The cluster status of the component.

nested_items.name: EnqueueReplication
nested_items.description: Indicates if or not enqueue replication is enabled for the ASCS component.

nested_items.name: AssociatedHost
nested_items.description: The associated host of the component.

nested_items.name: Hostname
nested_items.description: The name of the host.

nested_items.name: Ec2InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the associated host.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: The primary IP address.

nested_items.name: AllocationType
nested_items.description: The type of allocation for the IP address.

nested_items.name: OsVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the operating system.

nested_items.name: Databases
nested_items.description: The SAP HANA databases of the component.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Hosts
nested_items.description: The hosts of the component.

nested_items.name: HostName
nested_items.description: The name of the Dedicated Host.

nested_items.name: HostIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the Dedicated Host.

nested_items.name: EC2InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The instance ID of the instance on the Dedicated Host.

nested_items.name: HostRole
nested_items.description: The role of the Dedicated Host.

nested_items.name: OsVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the operating system.

nested_items.name: PrimaryHost
nested_items.description: The primary host of the component.

nested_items.name: DatabaseConnection
nested_items.description: The connection specifications for the database of the component.

nested_items.name: DatabaseConnectionMethod
nested_items.description: The method of connection.

nested_items.name: DatabaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the connected SAP HANA database.

nested_items.name: ConnectionIp
nested_items.description: The IP address for connection.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time at which the component was last updated.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.
(string) ---
(string) ---
